description:
While traveling to Osaka, Date encounters both Kai and Takeda. Meanwhile, Sanada is still shaken by Oyamada`s death, but presses on to Satsuma in order to carry out his mission.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sainantan Satsuma no Chi e! Yukimura, Arata naru Otoko no Deai
To the Southernmost Land of Satsuma! A New Encounter as a Man for Yukimura!!
最南端・薩摩の地へ! 幸村, 新たなる漢の出逢い
